alert.note: Alert for Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:48AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Madison and southeastern Washington Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 647 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Brentwood, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Huntsville... Elkins... West Fork... Winslow... Withrow Springs State Park... Wesley... Brentwood... Japton... Witter... Forum... Aurora... Georgetown... Wyola... Tuttle... Woolsey... Sulphur City... Delaney... Arnett... Hicks... Alabam... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 44 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
